## 

```{r}
library(caret)
library(e1071)

library(tm)
library(DMwR)

set.seed(2023)

tweets <- read_csv("data/senator_twitter_May-Oct.csv")

sample <- read_csv("data/full-labelled-sample.csv")

require(devtools)
install_version("tm", version = "0.7-1", repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
```
